column3: updated to also check for leading `-` in config file

Could add some tests, otherwise looks good:


```diff
diff --git a/test/functional/feature_config_args.py b/test/functional/feature_config_args.py
index 62091048f9..9be59b32b4 100755
--- a/test/functional/feature_config_args.py
+++ b/test/functional/feature_config_args.py
@@ -14,8 +14,29 @@ class ConfArgsTest(BitcoinTestFramework):
         self.setup_clean_chain = True
@MarcoFalke thanks, that's a neat test, added commit
we could also change this logic here to interpret it as `noX=1`, but I'm not sure what kind of syntax we want to support (bare "statements" are not ini-like) so I've left it as a suggestion\n
